nodes.text: The Package was an object of great value to Malastare diplomats, it was given as a gift to Supreme Chancellor Palpatine.

Two clone commando squads were assigned the dangerous task of retrieving the package intended for Supreme Chancellor Palpatine. Dispatched to Ord Mantell, White Squad (led by RC-1013 "Sarge") and Blue Squad attempted to intercept a gang of mercenary Trandoshans transporting it.

The Trandoshans killed Blue Squad and were pursued by White Squad to a meeting with Separatist battle droid forces. The ill-fated White Squad was whittled down to just Sarge, who tackled and executed the lead Trandoshan with his combat knife.
Upon receipt of the package, Palpatine privately revealed that it was a worthless trinket and had it stored with his other gifts.
